AddNodeStrategyTests
public
AddNodeStrategyTests
Functions
AddNode1
[Fact]
public void AddNode1()

Apply 'add node' mutations to the same initial genome multiple times.  Note. The mutations are random, therefore this tests different mutations on each loop.

AddNode2
[Fact]
public void AddNode2()

Apply cumulative 'add node' mutations.  This explores more complex genome structures as the mutations accumulate.

AddNode3
[Fact]
public void AddNode3()

Apply cumulative 'add node' mutations to 10 genomes, rather than the single genome in TestAddNode2().  This results in some mutations occurring that have already occurred on one of the other genomes, and therefore this tests the code paths that handle re-using innovation IDs obtain from the innovation buffers.
